name: tubecaster-telegram-bot
description: Simple video to audio caster telegram bot: @tubecasterbot
author: lilliputten <lilliputten@gmail.com>

scripts.ngrok-tunnel: echo --Start ngrok tunnel for flask and logging server (don't forget to add following ngrok address WEBHOOK_HOST to .env.local for webhook or .env.logging-ngrok for logging)-- && ngrok http 5000
scripts.pylint: echo --Run pyright python linter-- && poetry run pyright .
scripts.logging-server: echo --Run local logging server-- && poetry run python logging-server.py
scripts.logging-server-syslog: echo --Run local syslog logging server-- && poetry run python logging-server-syslog.py
scripts.pyformat-autopep8: echo --Run autopep8 python formatter-- && poetry run autopep8 .
scripts.pyformat: echo --Run blue python formatter-- && poetry run blue .
scripts.check-all: echo --Run all formatters, linters and tests-- && npm-run-all pyformat pylint
scripts.pytests: echo --Run python tests /poetry/venv/-- && poetry run python -m unittest discover -v -f -t . -s . -p *_test.py
scripts.dev: echo --Run flask dev server via poetry-- && poetry run flask --app api --debug run
scripts.export-requirements: echo --Export requirements from with poetry for vercel-- && poetry export -f requirements.txt --output requirements.txt --without-hashes && echo OK
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
